nodes.documentation: @title Monthly vesting with bonus
nodes.name: Vesting

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the beneficiary of a vesting schedule to release vested tokens to their account/wallet
   * @param _beneficiary The address of the recipient of vested tokens
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the to revoke the vesting schedule for a contributor with a vesting schedule
@param _beneficiary Address of contributor with a vesting schedule to be revoked
nodes.name: revokeVestingSchedule
updateVestingBeneficiary
transferRevokedTokens
_calculateBalanceWithdrawal
_calculateBonusWithdrawal

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculates the total amount vested since the start time. If after the endTime
the entire balanceRemaining is returned
nodes.name: _calculateTotalAmountVested

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

revokeVestingSchedule(address).details: Allows the to revoke the vesting schedule for a contributor with a vesting schedule

params._beneficiary: Address of contributor with a vesting schedule to be revoked

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferRevokedTokens(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to transfer any tokens that have been revoked to be transfered to another address

params._amount: Number of tokens to be transfer to recipient
params._recipient: The address where the tokens should be sent

updateVestingBeneficiary(address,address.details: Allow the owner of the contract to update the beneficiary of a vesting schedule

params._nextBeneficiary: The new recipient of the vestingSchedule

withdraw(address).details: Allows the beneficiary of a vesting schedule to release vested tokens to their account/wallet

params._beneficiary: The address of the recipient of vested tokens
